inclusion.criterion: all children referred with abdominal pain from January 2000 to June 2006
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: referred to one surgeon on the pediatric general surgery service at the Health Sciences Centre (HSC)-Children's Hospital in Winnipeg.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: children with abdominal pain due to other surgical or medical conditions
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 54-year-old obese woman admitted to the emergency department with abdominal pain that started 4 days ago.
